resource.name: Act100_BPH_SafeConnectAccess
resource.description: This dataset shows the analysis of safety, connectivity, and accessibility for each project in the Bike Plan Hawaii Refresh. This dataset is updated annually. For questions, please contact: DOT.BikePedProgram@Hawaii.gov

resource.name: Act 100 | Active Economic Vitality Projects List | STATIC
resource.description: This is a static dataset and provides a list of all ACTIVE Economic Vitality projects in the 2020 Act100 report. As mentioned, this is list is static and will not be updated as the reporting year (2020) has come to a close.

resource.name: HDOT2020_HPMS_FINAL
resource.description: This dataset houses the Mandli HPMS 2020 data. The original raw data is from HWY-P. If there is any use for this dataset, please contact Zero Wu (zero.wu@hawaii.gov).

resource.name: PED-PM-CRASH_REVISED
resource.description: This dataset contains pedestrian crash data for all roadways (county, state, federal) statewide. This dataset is updated annually. For questions, please contact: DOT.BikePedProgram@Hawaii.gov

resource.name: HDOT_UIPA
resource.description: This dataset is directly from ArcGIS UIPA Data: https://histategis.maps.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=9a867869a3e4442b8449fd1decf010cb
columns_name: Date a Notice to requester was sent

resource.name: Lava Flow Hazard Zones
resource.description: Volcano Lava Flow Hazard Zones - Hawaii County; Source:  USGS, 1991. For additional information, please refer to complete metadata at https://files.hawaii.gov/dbedt/op/gis/data/vhzones.pdf or contact Hawaii Statewide GIS Program, Office of Planning and Sustainable Development, State of Hawaii; PO Box 2359, Honolulu, Hi. 96804; (808) 587-2846; email: gis@hawaii.gov; Website: https://planning.hawaii.gov/gis.

resource.name: Summary Level Bridge Condition Dataset | Public | Act 100| STATIC 2020
Act 100 Data: STIP Projects
resource.description: This dataset was created using the STIP file and incorporates the Form-S from the planning branch. The dataset is used to show future projects based on the various Act 100 categories (Safety, System Preservation, System Efficiency, Modal Integration, Economic Vitality, and Resiliency).

resource.name: Active Economic Vitality Projects as of 12/31/2022 | Final List
HawaiiTT202001
resource.description:
Hawaii Truck Traffic January 2020 (01/2020).

This dataset displays truck traffic for January 2020 on all roads on the Hawaii State Highway System. This data is refreshed on a yearly basis.

Some data provided in this dataset includes: VMT, Route number, Name of road, etc.

resource.name: Active System Efficiency Projects List | End of CY 2021
HawaiiTT202005
resource.description:
Hawaii Truck Traffic May 2020 (05/2020).

This dataset displays truck traffic for May 2020 on all roads on the Hawaii State Highway System. This data is refreshed on a yearly basis.

Some data provided in this dataset includes: VMT, Route number, Name of road, etc.

resource.name: BIKE-PM-COMMUTE_REVISED
resource.description: This dataset contains data on the bicycle commute to work from the American Community Survey, U.S. Census Bureau. This dataset is updated annually. For questions, please contact: DOT.BikePedProgram@Hawaii.gov

resource.name: SHOULDER_POLYGONS
resource.description: This dataset is an inventory of shoulders along Hawaii Highways. resource.name: BIKE-PM-FACILITY_REVISED
resource.description: This dataset contains bikeway facility data for the state highway system managed by the Hawaii Department of Transportation. This dataset is updated annually. For questions, please contact: DOT.BikePedProgram@Hawaii.gov

resource.name: Volcano Boundaries
resource.description: Volcano Lava Flow Hazard Zones - Hawaii County; Source:  USGS, 1991. This layer shows the boundaries between the volcanoes on the Island of Hawaii. For additional information, please refer to complete metadata at https://files.hawaii.gov/dbedt/op/gis/data/vhzones.pdf or contact Hawaii Statewide GIS Program, Office of Planning and Sustainable Development, State of Hawaii; PO Box 2359, Honolulu, Hi. 96804; (808) 587-2846; email: gis@hawaii.gov; Website: https://planning.hawaii.gov/gis.

resource.name: Closeout Pipeline | Act 100 | Dollars and Dates| STATIC 2020
resource.description: This is a static dataset and provides Highway's closeout pipeline amounts. This data was used for the 2020 Act100 report. As mentioned, this dataset is static and will not update as the the reporting period has come to a close.

resource.name: Fire Risk Areas
resource.description: Ratings of risk from wild-land fires for major populated areas in the Hawaiian islands. Source: Department of Land and Natural Resources, Division of Forestry and Wildlife, Fire Management Program, 2007; Update - boundaries still valid per DLNR-DOFAW - 12/18/17.  For additional information, please refer to complete metadata at https://files.hawaii.gov/dbedt/op/gis/data/FireRisk.pdf or contact Hawaii Statewide GIS Program, Office of Planning and Sustainable Development, State of Hawaii; PO Box 2359, Honolulu, Hi. 96804; (808) 587-2846; email: gis@hawaii.gov; Website: https://planning.hawaii.gov/gis.
columns_description: Rating of risk from wild-land fires (High, Medium, Low, or N/A)

resource.name: HawaiiTT202008
resource.description:
Hawaii Truck Traffic August 2020 (08/2020).

This dataset displays truck traffic for August 2020 on all roads on the Hawaii State Highway System. This data is refreshed on a yearly basis.

Some data provided in this dataset includes: VMT, Route number, Name of road, etc.

resource.name: Active Resiliency Projects as of 12/31/2022 | Final List
New Lane Closure Merged Data
resource.description: Lane Closure Spatial data from ArcGIS aggregated by variables such as Route, Direction, Mile Post, Closure Begin and End Dates, Active, Weekday and Weekend formatted into Socrata in LineString format and replaced hourly via a script. The base data is generated from entries by HiDOT personnel into a survey123 dataset. This data is primarily used for visualizations and reporting purposes only.

resource.name: CURBS
